scripts.lint: npm run lint:prettier && npm run lint:eslint
scripts.download-ci-model: mkdir -p models && if [ ! -f models/Phi-3.1-mini-4k-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf ]; then curl -o models/Phi-3.1-mini-4k-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf 'https://huggingface.co/bartowski/Phi-3.1-mini-4k-instruct-GGUF/resolve/main/Phi-3.1-mini-4k-instruct-Q4_K_M.gguf?download=true'; fi
